title: Virtual Hover Pen
description: Successfully constructed a virtual hover pen using Python and OpenCV. Implemented real-time camera frame capture, color-based pen detection, and movement tracking. Users can engage in interactive drawing or interact with a digital environment through the virtual pen.

title: News App
description: Application where user can see the latest news all over the world. User can select the location, category as they want.

title: Chat Application
description: A platform that enables users to instant message and connect with each other. Multiple users can connect. Shows the number of connected users.

title: Weather App
description: A user-friendly weather app providing real-time forecasts. Track current conditions, hourly and weekly predictions. Customizable settings for location, temperature units, and interactive visuals for an enhanced weather-checking experience.
